name: The Real Housewives of Cheshire
overview: The series steps inside the champagne fuelled lives of Ampika Pickston, Dawn Ward, Lauren Simon, Leanne Brown, Magali Gorré and Tanya Bardsley. Throughout the series we’ll get to know these amazing characters and their intertwining lives. In the extreme world of Cheshire’s rich and famous residents, life moves fast and each day has its dramas, ensuring every episode will be action packed and entertaining. All with the gorgeous backdrop of the lavish homes and the exclusive locations that these women live in. The Housewives’ wealth and connections also mean that through them, you'll get unique access to the elite events and fabulous social occasions that punctuate the Housewives’ extraordinary lives.

seasons.name: Season 5
seasons.overview: Return of the reality show following the lives of a group of women residing in one of the UK's most affluent areas, with a new face joining the regulars.

episodes.name: Welcome to Cheshire
episodes.overview: Meet The Real Housewives of Cheshire and take a sneak peek into the homes, the families and the fabulous lifestyles of Cheshire’s most glamorous residents. As one of the biggest nights in the social calendar approaches, it’s a whirlwind of cryotherapy treatments, panicked last minute dress fittings, facials, pedicures and big misunderstandings over tickets as the Housewives prepare to attend Dawn Ward’s Crème De la Crème Charity Ball.

episodes.name: This Is Ladies Night
episodes.overview: As the dust settles on Dawn’s epic charity ball, Ampika, Tanya and Leanne hit the gym for a high energy boxing workout. Momager Dawn has some harsh words for her talented daughters and Cheshire NBFs Magali and Lauren bond over morning champers. Ampika throws an intimate dinner party for the Housewives and has a bombshell to drop over dinner. Snobbery jibes fly between Tanya and Lauren, while Dawn falls foul of some of her closest allies.

episodes.name: The Girl Who Got It All
episodes.overview: Ampika's dinner party revelations remain the hot topic of conversation, Dawn faces up to some real life issues, while Tanya and Leanne indulge in some crystal healing therapy. Could tingling boobs mean the patter of tiny feet for the Housewives? Tanya's glamorous book launch could result in another spectacular showdown as old friends Leanne and Magali come face-to-face.

episodes.name: Dressed For Success
episodes.overview: Leanne confides in Tanya over Magali's allegations, Ampika and Lauren take a trip to the local animal sanctuary, while Dawn has a heart-to-heart with Ashley about her health issues. Leanne hosts a charity auction for the stylish ladies of Cheshire, but after their showdown will Magali snub the event entirely? Plus, there is a pregnancy scare for one of the housewives.

episodes.name: Spa-ing Partners
episodes.overview: Tanya attempts to play peacemaker as she organises a lunch for Leanne and Magali to clear the air. The girls enjoy a relaxing a spa break at the luxury Cheshire castle.

episodes.name: Going Quackers
episodes.overview: The girls visit Peckforton Castle to take part in some outdoor pursuits. Lauren flies off to Arizona with husband Paul and she is gossiped about why she is away.

episodes.name: Big Night Out
episodes.overview: Ampika celebrates the first anniversary of her salon opening, but not all the housewives are invited to the party. Who is on the list and who has been snubbed? The girls attend a private art launch and head off for a big night on the town, where the arrival of someone's husband causes an unexpected showdown.

episodes.name: Happy Birthday Sweetie
episodes.overview: Leanne throws a party for her daughter whilst Lauren throws a party for the newest addition to her family, Sweetie The Rabbit. Ampika has to deal with some distressing family news whilst Dawn has a big announcement to make to the others.

episodes.name: Lady Luck
episodes.overview: Ampika spends some family time with ex-husband Mark, Dawn breaks her news to the rest of the family and gets some unexpected reactions, Ampika's feud with Dawn continues, and on a night out at the casino there are pre-nups, bust-ups and a clash between Ampika and Leanne.

episodes.name: Who's Coming to Dinner?
episodes.overview: Dawn hosts a glamorous dinner party at Warford Hall for all the housewives, but true to form not everything goes to plan and by the end of the night not everyone is welcome. Can friendships be mended before the series comes to a close?

episodes.name: Going Off The Rails
episodes.overview: It's Tanya's birthday party and there's trouble brewing and rumours flying between the Housewives. Dawn & Magali are at loggerheads over an incident on a train, Tanya has heard on the Cheshire grapevine that Ampika has been bad-mouthing her; meanwhile Lauren and Leanne bond over a luxurious spa treatment.

episodes.name: Girls on Film
episodes.overview: Magali takes a newly single Ampika on a makeover shopping trip, Tanya gets to the bottom of those cheating rumours and at the girls' summer barbecue. Lauren is outraged to hear that Leanne videoed Magali's outburst on the train.

episodes.name: You'll Never Be Me
episodes.overview: Magali confronts Leanne about the train video and Ampika gets an un-‘ex'-pected visitor. Lauren indulges in some fat freezing and there's trouble brewing at the Cheshire Polo Match, with the Housewives divided and a huge showdown between Dawn and Magali.

episodes.name: 20 Years and Counting"
episodes.overview: Leanne hosts a very Cheshire christening for her daughters Lilia and Lola, with Dawn and Tanya as godmothers. Magali spends some family time with Dean as they visit their footballing son Kenji in Swansea, while Lauren and Ampika judge a local dog show. Plus Tanya attempts to heal the rift in the group by inviting the girls on a night out, and Ashley has a romantic surprise for Dawn to celebrate their 20th wedding anniversary

episodes.name: Karma Is a Bitch
episodes.overview: Dawn and Ashley watch daughter Darby compete in Cheshire's prestigious Bolesworth International Equestrian Event. Leanne & Tanya jet off to Portugal and are in for a surprise meeting on the beach. Plus there's plenty of drama back in Cheshire as Magali and Ampika star in a magazine photo shoot, before Dawn and Magali come face to face in an attempt to clear the air once and for all...

episodes.name: Ladies Who Lunch
episodes.overview: Tanya plans a charity calendar and Dawn hosts a glamourous lunch to reunite all the Housewives. Dean has a romantic proposal for Magali and Lauren plays matchmaker for Ampika. Magali announces her exciting news to the group, and gets some very mixed reactions.

episodes.name: Calendar Girls
episodes.overview: Magali heads to London to find the wedding dress of her dreams, while Lauren and Tanya indulge in some 24 carat gold facial acupuncture. Sparks fly on the set of Tanya's charity calendar photoshoot as Ampika clashes with some old adversaries.

episodes.name: Uninvited
episodes.overview: The Housewives attend Leanne's teen fashion launch. Lauren sets Ampika up on a blind date that doesn't' quite go to plan, and at Tanya's Charity calendar launch Dawn discovers that she isn't invited to Magali's big day - so will any of the girls be going?

episodes.name: I Do, I Do, I Do
episodes.overview: It's Magali's big day as she prepares to renew her wedding vows with Dean, but as some people are not invited will any of the Housewives turn up to the event? And the arrival of an unexpected gift starts tongues wagging.

episodes.name: The Masks Are Off
episodes.overview: Ampika hosts a glamourous Masquerade Ball to celebrate her birthday but the night doesn't go to plan, with plenty of explosive drama kicking off amongst all the Housewives.

episodes.name: All Change in Cheshire
episodes.overview: Tanya has some very exciting news to tell the girls, Lauren has a heart-to-heart with Ampika, and Leanne and Dawn's friendship feels the strain after too many champagnes - but things soon hot up when three new housewives join the group.

episodes.name: A Currant Affair
episodes.overview: After causing quite a stir in Cheshire, Missé is shocked to hear the comments Dawn made about her. Lauren opens up to Ampika about her marriage and Leanne pushes Dawn for an apology. Stacey hosts a glamorous dinner party for all the Housewives. Will everyone get along or will someone be eating humble pie by the end of the night…?

episodes.name: Divas Dancing
episodes.overview: There are tears, tantrums and frayed tempers in Cheshire. Lauren heads off on holiday without Paul, as Ampika's feelings for her ex grow stronger. Tanya turns to pregnancy yoga while the other girls get their groove on at a diva dance class. Dawn attempts to clear the air with Missé but comes to blows with bestie Leanne on a night out with the girls..

episodes.name: Shaken and Stirred
episodes.overview: The fallout from Dawn and Leanne’s row continues with Dawn and Tanya questioning Leanne’s motives. Missé throws a glamorous cocktail party where Seema has a surprise for some of the girls, but not others. And the battle for the Queen Bee crown heats up as Dawn and Stacey go head to head.

episodes.name: Fabulous at 40
episodes.overview: Leanne hosts a glamorous Studio 54 birthday party where Ampika’s lack of outfit really turns heads and gets tongues wagging. Lauren kick starts her career and newly found independence, but has a huge bombshell to drop at the end of the night.

episodes.name: A Cheshire Girl in Paris
episodes.overview: Seema takes her latest collection to Paris Fashion Week with Tanya, Missé and Stacey, who all say ‘oh la la’ when a couple of unexpected guests crash the fashion show.  Missé’s mistrust of Ampika comes to a head with an almighty row, and back in Cheshire Lauren seeks guidance from her psychic about her marriage troubles.  Meanwhile Dawn is convinced that Ampika is plotting to turn best friend Leanne against her.

episodes.name: Going In-Seine
episodes.overview: The girls take Paris by storm, with Missé and Ampika attempting to move on after their clash at Seema’s Paris fashion show, but will it last?  Stacey owns up to having a wild past and Ampika expresses her true feelings for ex-husband Mark at a very emotional dinner in the Seine.  Back in Cheshire Lauren gets naked for a portrait painting session and Dawn spends some quality time with her girls.

episodes.name: Five Month Scan
episodes.overview: Tanya has a scan to find out the sex of her baby and reveals the news to the women in typical Bardsley style, while Dawn clashes with Leanne for going away without her.

episodes.name: Ready for Battle
episodes.overview: Ampika drives a wedge between Dawn and Leanne, Stacey is furious with Misse after a makeover disaster and Tanya storms out of a shampoo launch event.

episodes.name: Point of No Return
episodes.overview: There is trouble brewing on the eve of Taylor Ward's 18th birthday party and Dawn and Ampika come face to face for a dramatic final showdown.

episodes.name: The Reunion
episodes.overview: Brian Dowling hosts an explosive Reunion with our eight Housewives to relive some of the most talked about stories of the series. Which feuds are ongoing? What do the Housewives really think of each other, and what happened when the cameras stopped rolling? Expect tears, tantrums and lots of drama.

episodes.name: A Fair to Remember
episodes.overview: Make up, make up, never ever break up! The Real Housewives of Cheshire are back for a brand new series and the camp is still split. As Tanya enters the final stages of her pregnancy, friendships are at breaking point from gossip and postings on social media. Dawn is fuming that Stacey thinks she's manipulative but plays the doting mother-in-law, as Taylor brings her boyfriend Sam home much to Ashley's horror. Seema prepares her Autumn/Winter fashion collection while Missé gets back into modelling as a runway bride. With tension, drama and unfinished business, Cheshire's Golden triangle is set to explode with plenty of high drama, high hormones and high heels.

episodes.name: Welcome to The Jungle
episodes.overview: Hold on to your champagne glasses, The Real Housewives of Cheshire are celebrating hard. Ampika offers an olive branch to Tanya but will she be forgiven for hamster-gate? Stacey hosts a graduation garden party for her daughter, but things take a turn for the worst with a chaotic and disastrous arrival. Leanne throws a jungle-themed baby shower for Tanya – will the girls put their differences aside for one day or will the arrival of Ampika cause a big rumble in the jungle? It's just another day in paradise in Cheshire's glamorous Golden Triangle.

episodes.name: Whining and Dining
episodes.overview: The drama continues at Tanya's baby shower, with Missé in tears and Stacey standing up to Dawn. Lauren gives Ampika her own dose of ‘bad energy', while Leanne and Dawn give each other the cold-shoulder. It's game set and match for Anders and Missé, and Seema organises a glam dinner for the girls. Ampika drops a bombshell causing a drama with Dawn and Seema puts Ampika and Lauren in their place.

episodes.name: Bust-ups and Bombshells
episodes.overview: Tanya prepares for the imminent arrival of Baby Bardsley with a visit from the Baby Whisperer. Lauren is fuming with Seema after their dinner party bust up. Ampika launches her latest business venture, but will all the girls be there to support her? Missé drops a bombshell about her marriage, and the drama comes to a head as Leanne has words with Dawn…

episodes.name: Ooh Baby Baby
episodes.overview: Ready or not here I come… Baby Bardo's arrival is imminent and Tanya will try anything to get him out. Ampika reveals to Mark that she is the best ‘swinger' in town with a round of golf. Leanne and Dawn go head to head in another battle of the wills… And Dawn decides to plan an international surprise for Missé's birthday but will all the girls be excited?

episodes.name: Secrets and Lies
episodes.overview: Tanya arrives home with Baby Ralphi and a visit from godmothers-to-be Dawn and Leanne. The Housewives jet off to Barcelona for Missé's 30th Birthday, where she confides in Dawn about her ongoing marriage problems. Ampika has a heart to heart with Leanne about trouble in her love life and questions Missé's motives for inviting her on the trip

episodes.name: Heartbreak Hotel
episodes.overview: The Housewives continue their glamorous trip to Barcelona with more shock revelations and tears. Missé is annoyed to hear that Ampika has doubted her invitation, while Ampika opens up to Lauren and Leanne about her secret love life. At a very tearful final dinner, Missé reveals her marriage heartbreak to the entire group.

episodes.name: The Smell of Success
episodes.overview: Missé is heartbroken as news of her separation hits the newspapers. Ampika takes Leanne and Stacey on a spiritual journey and is shocked to hear what Dawn said about her in Barcelona. Lauren hosts a glamorous perfume launch party where Missé and Ampika attempt to clear the air.

episodes.name: Plastic Fantastic
episodes.overview: It's the day of Dawn's grand opening and Ashley jets off to Monaco – will the clinic be ready in time? Taylor reveals her split with Sam Reece to mum Dawn. Lauren hears what Seema and Stacey said about her perfume launch and isn't happy. Ampika signs up to find love with a megabucks dating agency and makes a very special surprise entrance at Dawn's party…

episodes.name: Bollywood or Bust
episodes.overview: Bollywood comes to Cheshire as Seema hosts a 45th birthday extravaganza. Post-birth Tanya has an extreme beauty treatment, vaginal tightening. Lauren is fuming that Seema criticised her perfume launch and wants to have it out with her face to face. Tanya gets her sari in a twist over Stacey, resulting in an explosive argument at Seema's party. This is one Bollywood movie you won't forget! Hold on to your Rickshaw cos the Bindis are flying!!

episodes.name: The Reunion
episodes.overview: Brian Dowling brings Stacey, Misse, Ampika, Leanne, Lauren, Seema, Tanya and Dawn together to discuss the latest series.

episodes.name: Czech Her Out
episodes.overview: Return of the reality show following the lives of a group of women residing in one of the UK's most affluent areas, with a new face joining the regulars.

episodes.name: Social Friends
episodes.overview: Seema and Stacey invite the women to celebrate their new business, but the night ends in high drama, tears and smashed champagne glasses.

episodes.name: The Elephant in the Room
episodes.overview: Dawn is shocked at Leanne's recent outburst. Lauren shoots a glamorous commercial for her perfume. Stacey reveals her latest art exhibit. There is major drama as the ladies gather for dinner, with tension brewing around the table and insults flying between Misse and Ampika.

episodes.name: Read All About It
episodes.overview: Dawn and Leanne's feud makes the newspapers, while there is a surprise in store for the women and talk of wedding bells at Warford Hall.

episodes.name: Every Dog Has Its Day
episodes.overview: Lauren has some friendly advice for Dawn. Ampika takes Ester for a very awkward spa day. Sam Reece makes a surprise appearance at Seema’s work. Leanne hosts a four-legged charity event – but will everyone be welcome?

episodes.name: Dubai Bound
episodes.overview: The housewives jet off to Dubai, but will they have a relaxing break away from all the dramas in Cheshire or will there be tears, tantrums and big surprises in the sunshine?

episodes.name: There's Something About Ester
episodes.overview: The Housewives' glamorous trip to Dubai continues. Stacey celebrates her birthday in style, and tongues start wagging about Ester's strange behaviour.

episodes.name: Nice Day for A Gay Wedding
episodes.overview: Nick and Royston prepare for their big day as they renew their vows at Warford Hall, but will everyone attend? Ester comes clean about her secret double life and shares some big revelations with the ladies.

episodes.name: The Smiling Assassins
episodes.overview: The ladies gather for Leanne’s swimwear launch. Meanwhile, there is fallout from Ester’s big revelation, and Dawn is on the warpath with Lauren.

episodes.name: A Midsummer Night's Mare
episodes.overview: Tanya hosts a midsummer party to celebrate the launch of her new boutique, but Ester falls out with Ampika, Seema and Stacey, and there is a showdown between Leanne and Dawn.

episodes.name: At Home with the Real Housewives of Cheshire
episodes.overview: Brian Dowling goes behind the scenes to meet women in their homes to find out what really goes on behind the closed doors of the reality show.

5.name: Season 5
5.overview: Return of the reality show following the lives of a group of women residing in one of the UK's most affluent areas, with a new face joining the regulars.

episodes.name: All White on the Night
episodes.overview: There are two fresh faces as the reality show returns. Tanya faces a dilemma, Dawn's family have a big decision to make and Ester bounces back with a revelation.

episodes.name: Into the Deep
episodes.overview: The ladies make a splash as they attend a pool party in Cheshire. Stacey's confession forces Tanya to face her fears. Ester's loyalties are tested, leaving her to question her friendship with Dawn.

episodes.name: Pretty in Pink
episodes.overview: The guest list for Dawn's blessing is confirmed, but who is invited? Ester attempts to heal old wounds. Nermina hosts a party to remember.

episodes.name: Episode 4 A Blessing in Disguise
episodes.overview: Cheshire prepares for Dawn's blessing. Ester starts to feel her fury. Tanya struggles to make Seema see sense. Lauren hosts a polo event.

episodes.name: Queen for a Day
episodes.overview: Ester attempts to reinvent herself as the new Queen of Cheshire. The Wards have some big decisions to make. Seema goes searching for answers. Leanne goes looking for love. Rachel has a surprise for everyone!

episodes.name: On the Rocks
episodes.overview: Can a glamorous trip to Gibraltar help the ladies build some bridges or will it all end in tears? Lauren’s loyalties are tested. Ester gets too close for comfort with twins Rachel and Katie. Tanya is shocked by an unexpected revelation, but will she be able to get some answers?

episodes.name: Best Frenemies Forever
episodes.overview: The ladies' trip to Gibraltar descends into chaos thanks to some mischievous monkeys, while their relationships reach breaking point as the insults fly at a late night dinner party.

episodes.name: Reach For The Stars
episodes.overview: In the aftermath of their Gibraltar trip, the women are keeping busy, but can a surprising invitation help mend old friendships?

episodes.name: Count Your Blessings
episodes.overview: Cheshire hosts high fashion, fast cars and, after months of debate, Tanya finally hosts the big Bardsley Christening. With everyone dressed up to the nines, tensions come to a head in an unexpected twist.

episodes.name: Czech Mate
episodes.overview: With the aftermath of the Christening dividing the housewives into two separate camps, Seema attempts to bring everyone together for a glamorous fashion show to celebrate empowering women. Can everyone forgive and forget?

episodes.name: The Reunion
episodes.overview: Brian Dowling hosts a reunion special to discuss the most talked-about stories of the series. Which dinner party held the most drama? Which friendships have stood the test of time? All will be revealed in the most explosive reunion show yet.

episodes.name: Surprise, Surprise
episodes.overview: The ladies are back and a surprise birthday party brings all the girls together again. Will Stacey and Tanya resolve their differences elegantly? Have Ester and Nermina truly moved on after their moment of madness? Meanwhile Tanya considers the implications of having another baby whilst Rachel contemplates Cheshire’s latest fashion accessory – a mid-life crisis.

episodes.name: Please Speak Clearly After the Tone
episodes.overview: An unexpected phone call from Stacey and Seema turns Ester's world upside down. Meanwhile Lauren's facelift breaks the ‘no strings attached' rule, Tanya goes to war at an explosive dinner party and Rachel's twin sister Katie arrives with some devastating news.

episodes.name: Don't Play It Again, Sister
episodes.overview: After the explosive discovery of Seema and Stacey's voicemail, battle lines are being drawn. Tanya and Ester try to build bridges, whilst Rachel risks blowing them up when she takes Dawn to task. Tanya takes Project Baby Girl to the next level, but can she convince Phil to get on board? And, as the ladies experience hot Latin dancing and gay bars, Stacey and Tanya try to put their disagreements to bed.

episodes.name: Close Encounters
episodes.overview: While Dawn calls on Nermina for some catwalk tips, Lauren uses her perfume range to reveal her new face and Rachel has an uncomfortable surprise in store for John. And at a spooky psychic night Ester hears a shocking secret which spells trouble for all the girls.

episodes.name: Days of Decadence
episodes.overview: It's time for the Ward girls to strut their stuff at London Fashion Week under the proud eyes of Nermina and Dawn. Rachel holds her twin Katie's hand as she faces her toughest day yet. There's a new face around Cheshire which gets Ester very excited, and Nick and Royston throw one of the most opulent parties Cheshire has ever seen.

episodes.name: The Girl Who Got It All
episodes.overview: Tanya celebrates a department store launch, while Seema plans a celebration of her own. Rachel tries to heal the group's differences, leading to a confrontation with an emboldened Nermina.

episodes.name: 7 Brides and a Groom
episodes.overview: It's a hen party for Seema to remember as she takes the girls to Marrakech. Nermina ruffles feathers at Lauren's birthday party, and Tanya might live to regret her decision to make the girls wear their wedding dresses for Seema's hen do.

episodes.name: The Bride's Bouquet
episodes.overview: There's more fun and frolics in Marrakech as Seema and Sandeep celebrate 25 years of marriage, but the day doesn't go without a hitch. Lauren's trip takes another turn for the worse, and Dawn finds herself in the thick of it. Having just arrived, Christine finds herself in hot water with Stacey.

episodes.name: Recipe for Disaster
episodes.overview: In the aftermath of Marrakech, Seema is still reeling from Lauren and Dawn's walk out from her wedding party. While Lauren is adamant that Seema is not understanding her situation, Dawn decides to make amends. It's mixed emotions for Tanya as Gabby hits her 16th birthday, and Nermina vows to speak her mind to Lauren at Stacey's tasting launch for her new cookbook

episodes.name: Love, Pride and Prejudice
episodes.overview: Dawn hosts Warford Hall's Pride Festival, while Stacey and Seema are accused of stirring up trouble on the internet and Rachel and Lauren fall out in between bouncy castle rides.

episodes.name: The Reunion
episodes.overview: The Housewives are back for their most explosive reunion yet. Get ready for fireworks as Brian Dowling bravely gets all the gossip from the glamorous ladies.

episodes.name: The Downward Dog
episodes.overview: The Housewives are back and Cheshire is on fire, literally! Rachel’s trust in husband John is dented when she discovers he’s been living a secret life. Tanya’s on the move after disaster strikes, whilst Dawn struggles with some difficult family news and new housewife Perla finds herself in a sticky situation.

episodes.name: Forty Five on the Inside
episodes.overview: It’s Dawn’s 45th birthday and Cheshire is in full on party mode. Rachel is reeling from the shock of John’s secret yoga classes with Perla. Ester finds herself in the firing line for some typically outrageous behaviour. After the fire, Tanya moves into a new house, and the fireworks go off in style at Warford Hall.

episodes.name: Dinner, Dancing… And a Disastrous Rectum
episodes.overview: The fallout from Dawn’s explosive birthday celebrations causes ruptures in Cheshire and Rachel questions her friendship with Ester.

episodes.name: Breast of Enemies
episodes.overview: Whilst Rachel and Perla finally bury the hatchet, Hanna realises that an uneasy truce could be coming to an end. Could there be trouble for Dawn and Tanya once more?

episodes.name: Too Hot to Trot
episodes.overview: The divide between Dawn, Rachel and Tanya grows even further as Hanna’s intentions are questioned more and more. Ester and Zdenka go in search of the perfect face whilst the ladies join Nermina for some horsing around.

episodes.name: Dog Date Afternoon
episodes.overview: Hanna’s well voiced observations have blown the fissures in Cheshire society wide open. Rachel and Dawn’s friendship is on the rocks, and the future for Dawn and Tanya looks even more bleak. Meanwhile Seema continues preparations for her dancing competition, Ashley’s mum and dad move into Warford Hall, and could romance finally be on the cards for Lauren?

episodes.name: Any Karma in Palma?
episodes.overview: Dawn’s dramatic blowout has left Cheshire in turmoil. She remains unrepentant, but the ladies begin to wonder if her behaviour is symptomatic of deeper problems. In a bid to lighten the mood, Ester invites the gang on a city break in Palma. Can bridges be built or will it simply lead to more problems for Tanya, Rachel and Dawn.

episodes.name: Cold Turkey and Chicken Limbo
episodes.overview: Ester's last attempt to unite the girls in Palma is skewered by a surprise visit from Christine that threatens to cause even deeper divisions. Meanwhile the girls are left in limbo, Tanya's struggles continue and Rachel goes large with John. Very large.

episodes.name: The Best of Intentions
episodes.overview: Rachel’s daughter Cheski turns 21 and Cheshire is ready to party. Ester’s best intentions raise eyebrows, while Lauren’s dog contributes to the interior design at Warford Hall. Meanwhile, Seema’s revelations spell trouble for Tanya and Perla.

episodes.name: Frenemies and Foxtrots
episodes.overview: The competition hots up as Seema’s charity dance competition gets underway. Tensions between Dawn and Rachel run high once more, whilst Tanya finds herself torn…

episodes.name: The Reunion
episodes.overview: Brian Dowling is joined by The Real Housewives of Cheshire as they dig deep into the highs and lows of the latest dramatic season. Can the ladies put their differences aside or are old feuds likely to be reignited?

episodes.name: Here Comes Trouble
episodes.overview: Dawn throws open the doors to Warford Hall and welcomes a VIP lodger – but has she taken on too much and how will the ladies react

episodes.name: Flirting with Disaster
episodes.overview: Ester has a saucy new career to focus on, while Rachel throws herself into charity work to avoid the issues she's having at home. Elsewhere, things get no better between Dawn and Tanya, and their feud leaves Hanna with plenty to ponder.

episodes.name: Grandma's Last Supper
episodes.overview: After the shock of seeing Hanna and Dawn fall out, Seema is on a mission to bring the women back together - with a dinner party.

episodes.name: Sex Tips for Housewives
episodes.overview: As the disastrous dinner party continues, Dawn opens her heart to Tanya, but questions Hanna's behaviour, while Rachel and Ester struggle to move on.

episodes.name: Leaping Off the Fence
episodes.overview: Dawn returns to Cheshire with devastating news and also has the stress of a business launch, while Perla has a shocking revelation about Hanna.

episodes.name: Calling Gloria Seema
episodes.overview: Ester's newest friend causes a stir at Warford Hall, Dawn releases her inner diva, Perla reveals some unexpected news to Jonny, and Tanya questions Seema's intentions.

episodes.name: Dubai Be Good to Me
episodes.overview: The women head off on a trip to Dubai, where Rachel's questions about Ester's behaviour are finally answered, while Dawn's relationship with Seema is tested.

episodes.name: Why, Why, Why, Dubai?
episodes.overview: The trip to Dubai draws to a close. Dawn does not understand Seema's decision to keep Perla's story to herself, and a a late-night disagreement gets out of hand.

episodes.name: P for Positivity
episodes.overview: Hanna struggles to understand why everyone is questioning her version of events, while Tanya hosts a Positivity Party to try to bring everyone back together.

episodes.name: Faultless and Fancy Free
episodes.overview: Hanna is back under Dawn’s wing but at whose expense? And is Rachel really to blame for all the recent drama, or has she been framed?

episodes.name: The Reunion
episodes.overview: As another roller coaster season comes to a close, the Housewives are back to chew the fat and swallow some home truths. Host Brian Dowling returns to ask the tough questions that everyone wants answers to. Have Dawn and Tanya really moved on? Did Hanna really trash talk Seema? And just how good was Ester's seabass in Dubai?

episodes.name: The Cult of Cheshire
episodes.overview: As summer breaks over Cheshire, the Housewives attempt to repair the rifts. Tanya harnesses all the positivity she can muster and Hanna counts down the days to her dream wedding.

episodes.name: Fighting the First Hurdle
episodes.overview: As Leilani gets to know the inner workings of the Golden Triangle, the ladies react to Ester's big news, and Dawn's world is rocked by an unexpected revelation.

episodes.name: Diamonds Are for Darby
episodes.overview: After Seema's tumultuous dinner party, Leilani has a revelation for the girls, Dawn struggles to keep a secret and Rachel faces her fears.

episodes.name: The Sweet Soul Sisters
episodes.overview: After battle lines were drawn at the polo, Dawn's furious with Leilani, Ester prepares for her dream photo-shoot and Rachel makes a life changing decision.

episodes.name: Leather, Feather, Flesh and Whiplash
episodes.overview: The Housewives are abuzz as they all prepare for the party of the summer, fetish themed event in celebration of Nick's 60th birthday. Not everyone is excited though, as Hanna struggles with the sauciness.

episodes.name: Playmates Of The Month
episodes.overview: The ladies head to the Czech Republic to celebrate Ester's appearance in Playboy, but will it help or hinder after Leilani's spat with Dawn and Rachel?

episodes.name: R.S.V.Peed Off
episodes.overview: As copies of Playboy hit the Czech news stands, Ester turns her attention to hosting Hanna's hen do. But who is and who isn't on the guest list?

episodes.name: Engaged, Enraged and Waiting for an Invite
episodes.overview: The ladies react to news of Michael and Darby's engagement, but the Darby decides to set some boundaries.

episodes.name: Wedding Belles and Bitches
episodes.overview: Hanna's wedding day arrives and there's excitement for the bride, but the Housewives wonder when their invites will turn up.

episodes.name: Never, Ever Break Friends
episodes.overview: As the Housewives recover from their wedding days, Hanna is left reeling when she learns all about what happened in Liverpool.

episodes.name: The Reunion
episodes.overview: The Real Housewives of Cheshire join Brian Dowling in a studio setting to debate the highs and the lows of their landmark tenth season. Expect fireworks!

episodes.name: Flutter Back Butterfly
episodes.overview: After a difficult year, Lauren Simon returns hoping to turn over a new leaf by reinventing herself as a butterfly and throwing a lavish party to celebrate.Meanwhile Dawn and Hanna's relationship is back on a collision course, Tanya gets ready to welcome a new addition to the family and Ester has some big decisions to make as she prepares to leave Warford Hall. The Housewives are also joined by no-nonsense business woman Nicole Sealey but will Lauren embrace her or will the accidental offender cause upset once again?

episodes.name: Excuses, Apologies, Excuses, Apologies
episodes.overview: As Rachel prepares for her 1970s-themed birthday party, the women begin to question the whereabouts of the cheeky Ester.

episodes.name: Stilettos on Fire
episodes.overview: As dog psychics and flirting coaches attempt to solve the women's problems, peace is shattered by a fight between Ester and Dawn.

episodes.name: Guts For Garters
episodes.overview: The chaos of Nicole's dinner party continues to escalate, leaving old friendships on the brink of implosion. Ester is accused of suggesting Dawn wanted her to have Ashley's baby.

episodes.name: Whatever Happens In Athens...
episodes.overview: As the Housewives head off to Athens for a week of fun and frolics, tension hangs in the air following Nicole's dinner party. Tanya questions whether her long-running truce with Dawn could be in jeopardy, whilst Seema worries whether one of her closest friends might not be as loyal as she had hoped.

episodes.name: A Storm In An E-Cup
episodes.overview: Series 11 - Episode 6 - Dawn arrives in Athens, and the housewives brace for trouble as her argument with Tanya resumes. Hanna and Nicole discover the joys of motherhood.

episodes.name: A Greek Tragedy
episodes.overview: As the Housewives react to Tanya's early departure, all efforts are made to make the most of the remaining time in Athens. A trip to a local vineyard soon lifts everyone's spirits whilst Lauren receives some exciting news in her search for the perfect man. However as the ladies meet for Seema's launch, a huge row between Dawn and Rachel pushes their relationship to breaking point.

episodes.name: The Real Housewives of Cheshire: The Reunion
episodes.overview: As season 11 comes to a close, the Housewives reunite in a special ‘lockdown' edition of The Reunion, direct from their mansions across Cheshire.Host Brian Dowling delves deep to get all the gossip, even welcoming some special guests along the way.

episodes.name: A Pregnant Applause
episodes.overview: The return of the reality programme following the lives of women who reside in one of the UK's most affluent areas, beginning with everyone celebrating the renewal of Nicole and Joe's wedding vows after the lifting of lockdown.

episodes.name: Kith and Kinsella
episodes.overview: As everyone reacts to news of Hanna's pregnancy, the Housewives celebrate the realities of motherhood, cracked nipples and all.

episodes.name: A Diva for Dinner
episodes.overview: As Ester makes the decision to spend more time in Spain with her partner, the Housewives welcome a new face to Cheshire, Lystra.

episodes.name: Anything with a Pulse
episodes.overview: Hanna reels from her row with Lystra, Dawn copes with a frightening diagnosis, and Lauren tests her spiritual side.

episodes.name: Naked... With a Horse?
episodes.overview: The housewives question what Rachel is doing when she appears naked on a horse. Plus, Dawn returns following her battle with Covid-19.

episodes.name: London or Bust
episodes.overview: The women head to London for a long weekend, but the trip is immediately plunged in to disaster as coronavirus strikes again and some of the group head back home.

episodes.name: Sliding in DMs
episodes.overview: As the Housewives return to the Cheshire social scene after their enforced isolation, Seema and Nicole question another Housewife's integrity when a series of anonymous direct messages provide an insight into their true feelings for their friends. The question is whether Lystra has been caught out, or if the Housewives should be more trusting of their new friend. Lauren's dinner party, held in Lystra's honour, may yet end in disaster.

episodes.name: We Know Who You Are
episodes.overview: Following the revelations at the dinner party, Rachel, Seema and Lauren turn detective to discover if Lystra could have sent the explosive messages that shook the Housewives or whether they were faked. Tanya heads back into isolation, Rachel goes steady and Nicole becomes frustrated with her place in the group. Meanwhile, as Hanna and Martin reach the 20th week of their pregnancy, everyone is excited to find out whether they are expecting a girl or a boy.

episodes.name: Courting and Cavorting
episodes.overview: Now that the world knows the gender of the Kinsellas' baby, it's back to work as Hanna plans her next step to world domination. Nicole and Joe explore the potential of her 'psychic abilities', but would she ever predict the outcome of Lauren's new makeover? Meanwhile, Rachel's new romance continues to flourish, but will it rub off on another Housewife when she sets them up on a blind date?

episodes.name: The Ice Queen Cometh
episodes.overview: Hanna is finally ready to launch her new business. Lystra returns from isolation, and Rachel tries to bury one of many hatchets.

episodes.name: The Last Supper
episodes.overview: With a new lockdown imminent, Seema hosts a dinner party in the hope that any tensions can be resolved so that the group can part on better terms.

episodes.name: My Demon Lover
episodes.overview: The Housewives emerge from lockdown just in time to celebrate the birth of Hanna and Martin's new baby boy, and Rachel dives deeper into her new relationship with Nick.

episodes.name: Still Sorry, Not Sorry
episodes.overview: Nicole continues to explore her 'psychic powers", and Seema's efforts to marry off at least one of her sons results in a surprise for Lystra and Jasmine.

episodes.name: A Stairway to Cheshire
episodes.overview: The fallout from Hanna's first night out pushes Tanya, Lystra and Nicole even further apart. Meanwhile, Seema and Debbie face their fears.

episodes.name: Pray for the Pillows
episodes.overview: The ladies head to the Lake District to celebrate Lauren, Lystra and Hanna's birthdays. While some disputes are laid to rest, Nicole soon finds herself in hot water for the most unexpected of reasons. Plus, there's surprises galore when the ladies indulge in a night of burlesque fun.

episodes.name: Don't Break the Lakes
episodes.overview: As the Housewives' trip to the Lake District continues, the birthday celebrations are interrupted by the ongoing fall-out between Debbie and Nicole. Rachel faces her fears as she tackles both bees and ghosts, Ester drops a bombshell and pushes her luck with Lystra.

episodes.name: Mourning Has Broken
episodes.overview: As the Housewives return to Cheshire, there's bad news for the Bardsleys as a death in the family causes heartbreak and Debbie realises her own grief may have had some unexpected side effects.

episodes.name: Posh Paws and Tall Tails
episodes.overview: Rachel achieves the impossible and brings Tanya and Nicole together in the hope that they'll rediscover their friendship as peace descends across Cheshire. Seema celebrates the opening of her new clinic, a doggy pamper day leaves Lystra and Debbie furious when they hear that they've been implicated in Hanna's conspiracy theory.

episodes.name: Miss Chievous and Miss Understood
episodes.overview: Former Miss Stockport Debbie hopes to reunite the Housewives with a pageant contest, but hula hooping, tap dancing and ventriloquism might not be enough to take the crown.

episodes.name: Bring on the Clowns
episodes.overview: As Debbie's pageant draws to a close, the curse of the dinner party strikes again, reopening old wounds for all to see. Can Tanya find a way to repair her rifts with Hanna and Nicole or have they finally reached breaking point?

episodes.name: Forty for the First Time
episodes.overview: The Housewives come together to celebrate Tanya's 40th birthday. Hanna and Tanya put their recent arguments behind them.

episodes.name: The Girl Who Cried 'Brains'
episodes.overview: A VIP day out at the Cheshire Horse Trials is on the horizon, while Tanya pleads with her mum Julie and daughter Gabriella not to go under the knife.

episodes.name: Tell Tales of the Unexpected
episodes.overview: Sheena feels the strain of trying to keep up with the ladies, and Debbie receives some bittersweet news from her daughter.

episodes.name: Dazed and Confused
episodes.overview: It's an emotional day in the Davies household as Debbie's daughter Tiffany flies the nest. The shocking news of Tanya's seizure spreads amongst the Housewives.

episodes.name: Forever Swimming with Sharks
episodes.overview: Fresh from her glitzy 50th birthday bash, Seema swaps diamonds and pearls for goggles and a snorkel as she and Nicole face one of their biggest fears - sharks! But after her head to head with Hanna, would Nicole prefer to socialise with her new fishy friends?

episodes.name: Edinburgh Baby!
episodes.overview: Debbie, Lystra and Lauren tour Edinburgh's historic landmarks on a private open top bus, before the girls indulge in Scottish dancing, bagpipes and haggis at a Scot's Night

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: With two chairs left empty at Seema's dinner party, the question all of the Housewives are left asking is where Hanna and Rachel are in Edinburgh. As the pair come to terms with the shock news of Hanna's pregnancy, they have to decide whether to face their frenemies or take the easy option and avoid them at all costs, but will a no-show just make matters worse for the pair? Meanwhile, plans to end the trip on a high are rocked when sparks fly at the ladies' very own Highland Games event.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: The Housewives return to Cheshire with a spring in their step as they prepare for the double whammy of Hanna's book launch and Rachel's boxing match.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Fight night has arrived and after weeks of training, Rachel and Leanne finally go head to head in the `Battle of the Housewives". But as the dust settles, questions continue to be asked about who could have leaked the news of Hanna's pregnancy.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Fresh off the launch of her doggy pawfume, Lauren and Gigi are taking the product to the public and their pooches. It's a family affair as Lystra's business empire looks to expand, Joe pays an emotional tribute to his Dad, Rachel hears some home truths, and Debbie opens up to Hanna and Martin. Meanwhile Sheena and Shane roll the dice on hosting a glitzy casino night.

episodes.name: The Curious Art of Forgiveness
episodes.overview: With tensions running high over ‘who told who’ and ‘who text what’, can an ‘intervention’ save Hanna’s friendships with Nicole and Seema?Cheshire’s most competitive couples take aim at clay pigeon shooting; Debbie receives some shock results at Martin’s clinic and can Lystra face her inner demons with the help of a therapist?Meanwhile, Nick and Royston host a clubbing party for all the girls to finally let their hair down. But who will go and who will no-show? Well, one thing’s for sure: staying home to avoid the drama doesn’t stop the drama arriving at your door.

episodes.name: Hark, The Cheshire Angels Sing
episodes.overview: Nicole and Hanna's recent reconciliation was nothing short of a Christmas miracle, but Hanna and Seema might not be singing from the same hymn sheet before Santa's sleigh takes flight. Lauren says goodbye to her family home, Debbie reconnects with the group and the gender of Cheshire's newest baby is finally revealed.

episodes.name: The Reunion
episodes.overview: The legendary Real Housewives of Cheshire reunion is back and better than ever. To celebrate this highly-anticipated 150th episode Brian Dowling is on hand to find out whether it's Seasons Greetings, or a case of frost-bitten friendships for the glamorous girls.

episodes.name: Another Year Older, Another Year Wiser?
episodes.overview: Seema throws Lauren a surprise 50th birthday party bringing the Housewives back together, but will it be drama-free? Meanwhile, Hanna prepares for her second baby with a photoshoot, Nicole dares Lauren to go on a zip wire, and Sheena and Shane celebrate a year of their super car business.

episodes.name: Vagina Monologues
episodes.overview: Lauren and Rachel treat Hanna to a relaxing spa as she prepares for the birth of her baby, Lystra hosts a glamorous lunch at her country house for Nicole, Sheena, and her new friend Katie, and Nicole organises a couples night.

episodes.name: The Greater The Obstacle, The Higher The Heels
episodes.overview: Hanna introduces her beautiful new baby to Rachel, Nicole and Lauren, Seema's back from Dubai and Lystra fills her in on all the gossip at the polo, Katie and Sheena catch up over trapeze yoga, Rachel organises a team-building activity day for all the housewives, and Lauren tells Katie how she really feels.

episodes.name: Keep Your Friends Close
episodes.overview: Lauren launches her new dog products and Nicole and Joe help her out, but will sparks fly? Meanwhile, Lystra gives Katie and Sheena a tour of her new restaurant, and Hanna hosts a sip-and-see for her new baby with an unexpected appearance.

episodes.name: To Move Forward You've Got To Look Back
episodes.overview: Rachel has some very big news, Katie introduces Hanna to her friend Ashley, Lauren is struggling to adjust to the new dynamics in the group, and Sheena hosts a '70s-themed birthday party, but will it be disco heaven, or disco hell?

episodes.name: Teeing Up A Storm
episodes.overview: As a game of golf results in high drama between Lystra and Nicole, Rachel takes Nick to his hair transplant and her twin sister gives her some relationship advice. Meanwhile, Katie hosts a drinks night for a select few.

episodes.name: Mayhem in Malta
episodes.overview: The Housewives arrive in Valletta for Nicole's glamorous drinks launch - as Rachel lets her hair down and enjoys a break from her responsibilities in Cheshire, Lystra arrives in style by private jet with an old friend.

episodes.name: High Drama on the High Sea
episodes.overview: It's sun, sea and stand-offs as the Housewives continue their holiday in Malta - Rachel and Lystra continue to bond, but Karen and Sheena struggle to get along with Lystra caught in the middle. Nicole hires a superyacht for a glamorous photoshoot and drinks reception, but who will rock the boat?

episodes.name: Back to Reality
episodes.overview: After an eventful time in Malta, the Housewives arrive back in Cheshire and Katie and Hanna catch up on all the gossip - as Rachel faces up to her responsibilities

episodes.name: Fashion Fever
episodes.overview: The Housewives are reeling after Jasmine's 21st birthday party - Nicole is still upset with the way that she's been treated, Rachel and Nick make plans for the future, Lystra tells Sheena her news and Seema's fashion showcase brings all the Housewives together.

episodes.name: The Reunion
episodes.overview: All the Housewives join Brian Dowling to catch up on the highlights of Series 15.

episodes.name: Gallivanting at the Gala
episodes.overview: The Housewives are going to the ball in this episode, with the glitzy Cheshire Gala returning and a new Housewife in town! Life's hectic for the Housewives at the moment - Rachel's a glam-ma, Hanna's struggling with motherhood, and Lauren's reinventing herself in more ways than one! The Housewives are ready for a glamorous night out at the annual Cheshire Gala, but will a new famous face be the belle of the ball?

episodes.name: It's Ladies Night and the Feeling's... Frosty!
episodes.overview: Rachel questions if Hanna interfered in her relationship, whislt lauren and Nicole continue to drift. Seema organises a night out to bring the girls together, but will a new addition to the group create a stir?

episodes.name: You've Been Served
episodes.overview: Natasha reveals some exciting news while Hanna and Rachel deny Seema's frosty accusations... will a dinner party thaw out the problem, or will it blow it up in flames?

episodes.name: Big 'V' Energy
episodes.overview: A dinner party leads to feuding Housewives, so Lauren hatches a plan to rekindle frosty friendships through the power of the vagina. But will she be successful, and how will the group react when Natasha's secret is finally let out of the bag?

episodes.name: Throwing Down the Gauntlet
episodes.overview: Lauren sets plans in motion for Lolly's Hollies as Sheena waves the American flag for her big charity event - the Housewives then team up for dodgeball at the fundraiser, but when strong rivalries come head-to-head, could the Housewives' fighting spirit take over more than just the game?

episodes.name: All Aboard Lolly's Hollies!
episodes.overview: The ladies land in Lisbon in Portugal with favourite OG Tanya, but when one Housewife cancels at the last minute, tensions build as the group speculate on who's to blame... and emotions run high when a girls' night out takes a dramatic turn.

episodes.name: Sun, Sea and Sass
episodes.overview: The Housewives' holiday in Lisbon continues, but the sunny spell is short-lived when Rachel makes a thunderous exit, and after Hanna makes a surprise arrival, tension builds between her and Paige.

episodes.name: Wonder Women
episodes.overview: Rachel is out with the old and Lauren is embracing the new - elsewhere, sparks fly between Nicole and Sheena, Natasha is officially crowned pop royalty, and Seema's charity event brings the house down thanks to a group of strong inspirational women with an important message for us all.

episodes.name: Jokers, Kings and Warring Queens
episodes.overview: When Joe reveals a touching surprise, Nicole can't believe her eyes! Lauren introduces the girls to more than just her new homeware line and things go from bad to worse when Sheena and Nicole fail to call a truce at Joe's emotional medieval party.

episodes.name: Dial Up The Diva
episodes.overview: Excitement is high as the Housewives finally watch Natasha perform her brand-new music, but building tensions between the group mean that the final number could end with a much bigger bang than expected.

episodes.name: The Reunion
episodes.overview: The Housewives join Brian Dowling to discuss the highlights of Series 16.

episodes.name: The Perfect Storm
episodes.overview: A storm is brewing as the Housewives head to the Lake District - their catch-up reveals that big changes are occurring as Rachel struggles to move forward with her next chapter and Seema drops a surprise that sends shockwaves through the group.

episodes.name: Divide and Conquer
episodes.overview: Seema and Nicole try to bring back peace and harmony after Lystra and Rachel's explosive row leaves a rift among the group.

episodes.name: A Night of Intrigue and... Aubergines?!
episodes.overview: Lauren and Ell put the ladies through their paces as things get rather colourful thanks to Nick and Royston.

episodes.name: All Will Be Revealed...
episodes.overview: Lauren gets some new housemates, Ampika drops a big surprise, and Rachel and Lystra finally meet up and try to make up.

episodes.name: Good Vibes Only
episodes.overview: Ampika treats the Housewives to a five-star trip to Mijas where things heat up in more ways than one, but there's confusion over an awkward message. Opinions over the message create a divide and result in a surprising fallout.

episodes.name: Sunshine and Shockwaves
episodes.overview: Nicole has some shocking news, Ampika and Rachel try making amends, and the girls' trip ends with a lavish dinner party.

episodes.name: The Diva Returns
episodes.overview: Lauren tries to handle being a local icon now that she's back in reality.

episodes.name: The Final Push
episodes.overview: Paige meets her beautiful baby girl, and Joe launches a cupcake venture.
